mapper.insert: insert into StudentClass(specialtyId, classNumber, className, holderStaffId, classBirthday, initStudentAmount, currentStudentAmount, currentStatus) values (#{specialtyId}, #{classNumber}, #{className}, #{holderStaffId}, #{classBirthday}, #{initStudentAmount}, #{currentStudentAmount}, #{currentStatus})
mapper.select: select id, specialtyId, classNumber, className, holderStaffId, classBirthday, initStudentAmount, currentStudentAmount, currentStatus from StudentClass where id = #{id}
